situation: My dog just died. I'm in shock.
utterance: I've had my dog for 15 years and he just died. I don't know what I will do without him.

situation: My dog just died. I'm in shock.

situation: I had to go to a wedding far out of the city I live in_comma_ and needed someone to watch my dogs.  A friend took over last minute and agreed to watch them for the weekend.

situation: I had to go to a wedding far out of the city I live in_comma_ and needed someone to watch my dogs.  A friend took over last minute and agreed to watch them for the weekend.
utterance: Oh no! That's awful!  I watch animals for a few different people and I would never do that.  That's very unprofessional. Did they have an emergency?

situation: Sometimes I feel bad for other students as they cannot afford college while my parents are paying my tuition in full.
utterance: Don't feel bad for the opportunity that you have. Life is not set out on an even keel so we all must make the best of our lot.
